summary: **Ratatouille** is a 2007 Pixar movie about a rat named Remy who wants to be a chef in Paris. He teams up with a kitchen boy, Linguini, to make his dream come true. The film was directed by Brad Bird and inspired by an idea from Jan Pinkava. It was a big hit, making over $600 million and winning an Oscar for Best Animated Feature. The food in the movie was designed with help from real chefs, and the story was based on early ideas from Pinkava.
title: Ratatouille (film)
